description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Maple & Pecan Roulade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin, Maple & Pecan Roulade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Steam pumpkin until very soft. purée until smooth. Set aside to cool.
Preheat oven to 190°C. Grease a shallow 26x35cm tray and line with baking paper, leaving long sides overhanging.
Sift flour, baking powder and spice together. Beat eggs and vanilla in an electric mixer for 6 minutes until thick and pale. Gradually add sugar, beating, until very thick and glossy.
Stir in pumpkin until combined. Lightly fold in flour mixture. Spread in tray and smooth the surface. Bake for 8 minutes or until light golden.
Meanwhile, lay a clean tea towel on the bench. Cover with a large piece of baking paper. Sprinkle with pecans.
Quickly brush top of cooked cake with a little of the maple syrup. Turn cake out onto the pecans. Roll up cake from the short end using the paper and tea towel. Leave to cool.
Whip cream cheese with remaining maple syrup until smooth. Unroll cake, discard paper and spread with cream cheese. Re-roll and transfer to a serving plate.
